rows.label: qst700802_msg0001
rows.name: Can I talk to you all for a moment?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0002
rows.name: What's on your mind Shin?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0003
rows.name: Don't you think it's strange?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0004
rows.name:
The forest may be close to the road,
but even so, there shouldn't be this
much trash lying around.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0005
rows.name:
Hmm... Maybe some passersby were
attacked by monsters and had to dump
their stuff?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't think that's very likely. The gate
guards would have noticed.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0007
rows.name:
But why would someone come all the
way out here to get rid of this stuff?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0008
rows.name: There...may not have been a reason.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0009
rows.name: Come again?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0010
rows.name:
What I mean is, I think they simply
threw it away for the sake of throwing
it away.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0011
rows.name: ...Sorry, I'm still not getting you here.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0012
rows.name:
He's saying that somebody has
simply been pulling a prank.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0013
rows.name: A prank?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0014
rows.name: But who'd do something like that?

rows.label: qst700802_msg0015
rows.name:
We're going to need more clues,
if we want to assemble a picture
of the perpetrator, it seems.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0016
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: qst700802_msg0017
rows.name:
What in the...
Guys, look!

rows.label: qst700802_msg0018
rows.name: There's...more than before...

rows.label: qst700802_msg0019
rows.name:
I think it's clear now that someone's
doing this intentionally.

rows.label: qst700802_msg0020
rows.name:
First of all, let's go and pick up
the rest of the litter.
